##Preparation

###Library
```{r}
library()
library(readr)
library(dplyr)
library(stringr)
```

###Load Data
Contains a compound-specific response index for each gene  obtained by normalizing the gene’s average transcript level following perturbations in the 2 clones against its average level across all perturbations within the same experimental batch. All analyses in the paper are conducted using this processed data set. 
```{r}
data<-read.table("expression_data.csv",sep="\t",header=TRUE)
data[is.na(data)]<-0

rownames(data)<-data[,1]
data<-data%>%select(-PlasmoDBID)

colnames(data)
```
